doc.field: week ahead. if you want to find out what the weather will bring in the next week or so, the weather for the 00:29:08160 --> 4294966103:13:29430 week ahead is coming up. hello, i'm nuala mcgovern, this is outside source. at a climate change summit of world leaders in new york - the un secretary general declares that 'time is running out, but it's not too late'. swedish campaigner greta thunberg
